home.homeOurProfileFirstContent: Established in September 2020, the Company brings expertise, experiences, networks and strong financial capability in the industry.
home.homeOurProfileSecondContent: The Company has its core business activities in commercializing web-portal and digital platform. It is also optimized with our ability to deliver an integrated solution to accommodate the customers needs.
home.homeOurProfileThirdContent: With a combined strong technical – commercial – operations abilities, the Company is able to deliver the best output for customers’ satisfaction.

about.aboutMerdekaFirstContent: Merdeka Pulsa is a trustworthy provider of digital products who is also supported with latest technology to guarantee the security of your transaction.
about.aboutMerdekaSecondContent: Merdeka Pulsa commits to encourage convenience in  accelerating clients' business by offering simple registration, smooth transactions, web-access for transactions monitoring, competitive product prices, and responsive helpdesk.

registration.modalAfterRegistration: Thanks for your registration at Merdeka Pulsa. Our team will contact you for verification in 1 x 24 hours.
registration.registrationInformation: For more information, please reach us at
